foreignData.name: Sceada-Horst
foreignData.text:
Bonus {2}{U} (Du kannst zusätzlich {2}{U} bezahlen, sowie du diesen Zauberspruch wirkst.)
Wenn der Sceada-Horst ins Spiel kommt und falls seine Bonuskosten bezahlt wurden, erzeuge einen 2/2 blauen Sceada-Kreaturenspielstein mit Flugfähigkeit.
Immer wenn du einen Zauberspruch wirkst und Bonuskosten für ihn bezahlst, erzeuge einen 2/2 blauen Sceada-Kreaturenspielstein mit Flugfähigkeit.

foreignData.name: Nido de dracos
foreignData.text:
Estímulo {2}{U}. (Puedes pagar {2}{U} adicionales al lanzar este hechizo.)
Cuando el Nido de dracos entre al campo de batalla, si fue estimulado, crea una ficha de criatura Draco azul 2/2 con la habilidad de volar.
Siempre que lances un hechizo estimulado, crea una ficha de criatura Draco azul 2/2 con la habilidad de volar.

foreignData.name: Perchoir des drakôns
foreignData.text:
Kick {2}{U} (Vous pouvez payer {2}{U} supplémentaires au moment où vous lancez ce sort.)
Quand le Perchoir des drakôns arrive sur le champ de bataille, s'il a été kické, créez un jeton de créature 2/2 bleue Drakôn avec le vol.
À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort kické, créez un jeton de créature 2/2 bleue Drakôn avec le vol.

foreignData.name: Nido di Draghetti
foreignData.text:
Potenziamento {2}{U} (Puoi pagare {2}{U} addizionale mentre lanci questa magia.)
Quando il Nido di Draghetti entra nel campo di battaglia, se è stato potenziato, crea una pedina creatura Draghetto 2/2 blu con volare.
Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia potenziata, crea una pedina creatura Draghetto 2/2 blu con volare.

foreignData.name: ドレイクの休息地
foreignData.text:
キッカー{2}{U}（あなたはこの呪文を唱えるに際し、追加で{2}{U}を支払ってもよい。）
ドレイクの休息地が戦場に出たとき、これがキッカーされていた場合、飛行を持つ青の２/２のドレイク・クリーチャー・トークンを１体生成する。
あなたがキッカーされている呪文を唱えるたび、飛行を持つ青の２/２のドレイク・クリーチャー・トークンを１体生成する。

foreignData.name: 드레이크 둥지
foreignData.text:
키커 {2}{U} (당신은 이 주문을 발동하면서 추가로 {2}{U}를 지불할 수 있다.)
드레이크 둥지가 전장에 들어올 때, 드레이크 둥지의 키커 비용이 지불되었다면, 비행을 가진 2/2 청색 드레이크 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.
당신이 키커 비용이 지불된 주문을 발동할 때마다, 비행을 가진 2/2 청색 드레이크 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.

foreignData.name: Poleiro de Dragonetes
foreignData.text:
Reforçar {2}{U} (Você pode pagar um custo adicional de {2}{U} conforme conjura esta mágica.)
Quando Poleiro de Dragonetes entrar no campo de batalha, se ele tiver sido reforçado, crie uma ficha de criatura azul 2/2 do tipo Dragonete com voar.
Toda vez que você conjurar uma mágica reforçada, crie uma ficha de criatura azul 2/2 do tipo Dragonete com voar.

foreignData.name: Гнездовье Дрейков
foreignData.text:
Усилитель {2}{U} (При разыгрывании этого заклинания вы можете дополнительно заплатить {2}{U}.)
Когда Гнездовье Дрейков выходит на поле битвы, если оно получило Усилитель, создайте одну фишку существа 2/2 синий Дрейк с Полетом.
Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете заклинание, получившее Усилитель, создайте одну фишку существа 2/2 синий Дрейк с Полетом.

foreignData.name: 龙兽宿巢
foreignData.text:
增幅{2}{U}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{2}{U}。）
当龙兽宿巢进战场时，若它已增幅，则派出一个2/2蓝色，具飞行异能的龙兽衍生生物。
每当你施放已增幅的咒语时，派出一个2/2蓝色，具飞行异能的龙兽衍生生物。

foreignData.name: 龍獸宿巢
foreignData.text:
增幅{2}{U}（你施放此咒語時可以額外支付{2}{U}。）
當龍獸宿巢進戰場時，若它已增幅，則派出一個2/2藍色，具飛行異能的龍獸衍生生物。
每當你施放已增幅的咒語時，派出一個2/2藍色，具飛行異能的龍獸衍生生物。

name: Roost of Drakes
originalText:
Kicker {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} as you cast this spell.)
When Roost of Drakes enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.
Whenever you cast a kicked spell, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.

rulings.text: You can’t pay a kicker cost more than once.
If you put a permanent with a kicker ability onto the battlefield without casting it, you can’t kick it.
Kicker represents an optional additional cost that you may choose to pay as you cast the spell. A spell cast with that additional cost paid is “kicked.”

If you copy a kicked spell, the copy is also kicked. If a card or token enters the battlefield as a copy of a permanent that’s already on the battlefield, the new permanent isn’t kicked, even if the original was.

To determine a spell’s total cost, start with the mana cost (or an alternative cost if another card’s effect allows you to pay one instead), add any cost increases (such as kicker), then apply any cost reductions. The converted mana cost of the spell is determined only by its mana cost, no matter what the total cost to cast the spell was.

Some instant or sorcery spells require alternative or additional targets if they’re kicked. You ignore these targeting requirements if those spells aren’t kicked, and you can’t kick those spells unless you can choose the appropriate targets. On the other hand, you can kick a permanent spell even if you won’t be able to choose targets for an enters-the-battlefield ability of that permanent once the spell resolves.

An ability that triggers when a player casts a kicked spell resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger, but after targets have been chosen for that spell. It resolves even if that spell is countered.
